title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1240.24 - Costs and Disbursements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1240.24 - Costs and Disbursements

State Regulations

The necessary costs and disbursements of
an agency, committee or appointed attorney in conducting a proceeding under
this Part shall be paid in accordance with Judiciary Law ยง 90(6). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1240.24

Adopted

New

York State Register October 12, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 41, eff. 10/1/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
